headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Schyster Deviant
content:
Once upon a time the Deviant was considered an underdog in the muscle car field. But in the land of opportunity, an underdog is only a genetically-engineered monstrosity in waiting, and that’s something Team Schyster know all too well.

Revamped, remodelled, re-engineered and released on the unsuspecting streets of Los Santos, the Deviant is back, and it’s got a point to prove.
